mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fundname AS "fundname", a.fundno AS "fundno", a.releasedate AS "releasedate", a.type AS "type", a.profit AS "profit", a.profit7d AS "profit7d", a.profit14d AS "profit14d", a.profit28d AS "profit28d", a.profit35d AS "profit35d", a.profit1m AS "profit1m", a.profit3m AS "profit3m", a.profit6m AS "profit6m", a.profit1y AS "profit1y", a.profity AS "profity", a.charge AS "charge", a.minibuy AS "minibuy"

mapper.update: UPDATE fund SET fundname = #{fundname}, fundno = #{fundno}, releasedate = #{releasedate}, type = #{type}, profit = #{profit}, profit7d = #{profit7d}, profit14d = #{profit14d}, profit28d = #{profit28d}, profit35d = #{profit35d}, profit1m = #{profit1m}, profit3m = #{profit3m}, profit6m = #{profit6m}, profit1y = #{profit1y}, profity = #{profity}, charge = #{charge}, minibuy = #{minibuy} WHERE id = #{id}
